programme.title: WNBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Fever and Dream complete their season series with this contest in the Hoosier State. Atlanta grabbed a 2-1 advantage in the yearly set with a 77-58 victory over Indiana on June 10. Brionna Jones (ATL) set a season high with 21 points in that win.

programme.title: WNBA On ION Game Break Show
programme.sub-title: WNBA On ION Game Break Show

programme.title: WNBA Basketball
programme.desc: Climate Pledge Arena hosts the second leg of a home-and-home between the Sun and Storm. Seattle beat Connecticut 97-81 in its last home game June 27. Connecticut rookie Aneesah Morrow double-doubled in each of her past two appearances on the road.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: When an overenthusiastic neighborhood watch group asks Magnum and Higgins to investigate a shady character living on their block, they are shocked to find that they may have inadvertently stumbled upon a serial killer on the loose.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: When a young man in need of immediate emergency surgery goes missing with a bullet lodged in his chest, Ethan asks Magnum and Higgins to find him before it's too late; TC talks to a military recruit who may be enlisting for the wrong reasons.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: When Higgins is abducted, Magnum discovers it's retaliation related to one of his first cases; Magnum, Rick and TC must break out an ex-client from prison in order to save her.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick (Rob Stewart) is driven to find the killer of a woman whose body he finds on the beach. With Carolyn Dunn.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: Nick travels to Israel with a wealthy woman who is trying to keep her ex-husband from kidnapping her daughter.

programme.title: Tropical Heat

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan tries online dating but ends up the target of a shooting when she tries to meet her date at a local restaurant.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When the remains of a filmmaker are found in the ventilation shaft of an underground tunnel, Brennan and Booth discover a subterranean world of homeless people.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The investigation of the bones of a shooting victim leads to a counterfeiting ring.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When a body is found clutching a 300-year-old finger bone, Booth and Brennan's investigation leads them to a dive site where a pirate may have buried his treasure.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU investigates the sexual assault of a 15-year-old boy, but when he won't cooperate, they must find another way to uncover his perpetrator; Rollins reconnects with her ex, and Benson worries she isn't the Wonder Woman she used to be.

programme.desc: SVU investigates the sexual assault of a 15-year-old boy, but when he won't cooperate, they must find another way to uncover his perpetrator; Rollins reconnects with her ex; Benson worries she isn't the Wonder Woman she used to be.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl taken from her mother at the U.S.-Mexico border ends up in a sex-trafficking ring in New York, and Benson and Stone fight to reunite the girl with her mother; Rollins confesses to her ex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a masked pizza deliveryman assaults a seemingly random couple in their home, SVU must unravel a complicated revenge plot before anyone else is victimized.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU investigates the assault, murder and mutilation of a member of a women's empowerment group; Fin and Carisi wonder who the father of Rollins' baby is.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU must unravel the mystery of a sexually assaulted young homeless woman who has a dual personality; when she goes missing after being assaulted, the team is challenged to uncover not only her identity but also her whereabouts.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU investigates when a father and his two young children are stabbed to death in their home; when the motives of the culprit are uncovered, Benson finds herself having mixed feelings about the nature of the crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a waitress at a popular restaurant is sexually assaulted, SVU looks for the culprit at the top of the culinary food chain, but Benson and Stone hit a wall when it's time to prosecute.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stone asks Benson to investigate a sexual encounter from his past that he feels guilt and uncertainty about; Rollins considers a proposal from Doctor Al.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The murder of an elusive, shy teenage author living a double life leads Benson and the rest of the SVU on an investigation that uncovers a situation beyond their wildest imaginations.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young woman accuses a celebrity plastic surgeon and his girlfriend of sexual assault, Benson and the team must determine if the woman was attacked or if it was a night of sex games gone wrong.
